select a.numPriceId , a.resource, case when a.net_type = '电信' then 1 when a.net_type = '联通' then 2 when a.net_type = '移动' then 3 else 0 end net_type, a.province_name, a.city_name, a.feature, a.price, a.is_freeze,a.id ,a.with4,a.teleType,a.skuTobPrice,a.skuTocPrice,a.netType,a.numLevel,a.lowConsume,a.tags select a.numPriceId, a.resource, case when a.net_type = '电信' then 1 when a.net_type = '联通' then 2 when a.net_type = '移动' then 3 else 0 end net_type, a.province_name, a.city_name, a.feature, a.price, a.is_freeze,a.numId, a.status, a.city_code from ( SELECT IF(@resource = b.resource, @rn := @rn + 1, @rn := 1) AS rn, @resource := b.resource AS resource, concat(b.id,'') numPriceId, b.net_type, b.province_name, b.city_name, b.feature, b.price, b.agent_id,n.is_freeze,concat(n.id,'') id ,n.with4, if(n.tele_type is null,'',n.tele_type) as teleType, sku.sku_tob_price as skuTobPrice, sku.sku_toc_price as skuTocPrice, n.net_type as netType,n.num_level as numLevel,n.low_consume as lowConsume,'tag' as tags
FROM tb_num_price b, tb_num n, tb_goods c, tb_sku sku, (select @rn := 0, @resource := null) d where b.num_id = n.id and n.status = 2 and b.is_del = 0 and b.sku_id = sku.sku_id and c.g_id = sku.g_id and c.g_is_auc = 0 and c.`status`=1 and sku.sku_goods_type = '4' and c.g_is_sale = '1' and SYSDATE() between c.g_start_time and c.g_end_time
SELECT IF(@resource = b.resource, @rn := @rn + 1, @rn := 1) AS rn, concat(b.id,'') numPriceId, n.status, b.city_code, @resource := b.resource AS resource, b.net_type, b.province_name, b.city_name, b.feature, b.price, b.agent_id,n.is_freeze,concat(n.id,'') numId FROM tb_num_price b, tb_num n, (select @rn := 0, @resource := null) d where b.num_id = n.id and n.status = 2 and b.is_del = 0 and b.channel = #{param.channel} and (b.agent_id = -1 or b.agent_id = #{param.agentId}) and b.province_code = #{param.provinceCode} and b.city_code = #{param.cityCode} and b.net_type = #{param.netType} and b.feature REGEXP ".*,"#{param.feature}",.*" and b.resource like #{param.temp} and b.resource like "%"#{param.resource}"%"
ORDER BY b.agent_id desc ) a where a.rn = 1
